content.text: Hey! I'm a huge fan of baseball too! My favorite player is Mike Trout!
Awesome! He's a great player. I'm a fan of the Dodgers, so I'm a little biased towards Mookie Betts.
I love Betts too! He's definitely one of the best in the game right now.
I agree! I'm glad he won MVP last year.
Yeah, he deserved it. Have you been to a lot of baseball games?
I have! I go to a few games every year, usually when the Dodgers are in town.
That's awesome! I've been to a few games too, but I'm not able to go as often as I'd like.
Yeah, they can be expensive. But it's always a great time.
Yeah, it is! What's your favorite thing about baseball?
I love the excitement of the game. There's always something happening, and you never know what's going to happen next.
I agree! It's always a good time.
